name: Garrison: Archangel (DEMO)
description:
Garrison: Archangel is a fast-paced, customizable, mecha fighting game designed for one-on-one and multiplayer team battles.

The game features deep mech customization in which you get to choose from a multitude of weapons, attachments and mecha frame parts to make the best mech for you.

Have extremely intense mecha fights with your friends on various maps and game modes with your personalized mech. Master your mech's strengths with Garrison: Archangel's technical yet flexible combat.

Features

Customize your Mechs for different play styles

Choose from the set of Mechs

Play with up to four friends through the local multiplayer

Create mechs, and battle them with the game's built in AI system

Suit up and pilot your own Archangel today!
